itemDescription: British-American animator, voice actor, musician and head of Disney sound effects department (1906-1991)

wikipedia_page.main: John James MacDonald  (May 19, 1906 – February 1, 1991) was a Scottish-American foley artist, conductor, musician and voice actor. He was the original head of the Disney sound effects department, and was also the 2nd official voice of Mickey Mouse from 1947 to 1976 and again in 1978.
